Using a Mouse

moving the mouse

Home

A mouse is used to click on items. As you move your mouse over an item, usually something changes to indicate that it can be clicked, such as to the cursor or the background colour.

When you move your mouse over an app, file, or folder, the background of the item, and its border, will change colour. Try it on the items on the right.
